title: 199: Clare’s FINAL Bachelorette Recap: Ep 4 (WE KNEW IT! + An UNPRECEDENTED Proposal + TAYSHIA! TAYSHIA! TAYSHIA!)
itunes:title: 199: Clare’s FINAL Bachelorette Recap: Ep 4 (WE KNEW IT! + An UNPRECEDENTED Proposal + TAYSHIA! TAYSHIA! TAYSHIA!)
description:
The Broads are BEYOND excited to begin a season with Tayshia! *happy screams* BUT before we dive into that, we must TALK about some serious tea and the La Quinta proposal! Let’s chat, Broads!
